We are delighted to welcome [Victor Sabanza](https://twitter.com/VictorSabanza) as a PhD student! He will be part of our NCCR Catalysis team and will share a joint appointment at LIAC and the Luterbacher group (LPDC)

![](victor.jpg)

Victor got his undergraduate degree in chemistry at the University of La Rioja and his master's degree in complex systems chemistry at Strasbourg University. Welcome!
